definitions.definition: Any one of various common types of small insects or animals which cause harm and annoyance.
definitions.example: The area was plagued by all sorts of vermin: fleas, lice, mice, and rats to name a few.

definitions.definition: Animals that prey on game, such as foxes or weasels.
Obnoxious, or mean and offensive person or people.
definitions.example: Bring these vermin to the Palace of Justice.
